Provision.Text: Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Finance, pursuant to sections 467a, 479a and 978b of the Bank Actc, hereby makes the annexed Investment Limits (Banks) Regulations.

Section.Text: The following definitions apply in these Regulations.

Definition.Text: designated entity means an entity other than

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: a joint venture;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: an insurance company;

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: a securities dealer; or

Paragraph.Label: (d)
Paragraph.Text: a subsidiary of an insurance company or securities dealer. (entité désignée)

Definition.Text: insurance company means an insurance company incorporated by or under the laws of Canada or a province. (société d’assurances)
joint venture means a real property entity

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: that was formed by a bank, or by a designated entity controlled by a bank, and one or more other persons for the purpose of a specific business undertaking;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: in which the bank or designated entity has a substantial investment; and

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of which the persons who formed it have agreed on joint control, regardless of the distribution of their equity. (coentreprise)

Definition.Text: real property entity means an entity that is primarily engaged in holding, managing or otherwise dealing with

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: real property;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: shares of a body corporate that is primarily engaged in holding, managing or otherwise dealing with real property, including shares of a body corporate that is another real property entity; or

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: ownership interests in an unincorporated entity that is primarily engaged in holding, managing or otherwise dealing with real property, including ownership interests in an unincorporated entity that is another real property entity. (entité immobilière)

Definition.Text: related real property entity, in respect of a bank, means

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: a real property entity, other than a designated entity controlled by the bank, in which the bank or a designated entity controlled by the bank beneficially owns sufficient shares or ownership interests to cause the bank or designated entity to have a substantial investment in the real property entity; or

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: a real property entity that is controlled by a real property entity described in paragraph (a). (entité immobilière apparentée)

Definition.Text: securities dealer means an entity described in paragraph (g) of the definition financial institution in section 2 of the Act. (négociant en valeurs mobilières)
third party, in respect of a bank, means a person other than

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: the bank;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: a designated entity controlled by the bank; or

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: a related real property entity of the bank. (tierce partie)

Section.MarginalNote: Book value of interest in real property
Section.Text: For the purposes of sections 8 to 11, the book value of an asset that is an interest of a bank in real property, at a particular time, is

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: if the asset is real property, the gross book value of the real property, less any accumulated depreciation on the real property, that would be reported on a balance sheet of the bank prepared as at that time in accordance with the accounting principles and specifications of the Superintendent referred to in subsection 308(4) of the Act; and

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: if the asset is a security or loan, the book value of the security or loan that would be reported on a balance sheet of the bank prepared as at that time in accordance with the accounting principles and specifications of the Superintendent referred to in subsection 308(4) of the Act.

Section.Text: Sections 476 to 478 of the Act do not apply to

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: a widely held bank with equity of one billion dollars or more; or

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: a bank with equity of one billion dollars or more that is controlled by

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: a widely held bank holding company,

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: a widely held insurance holding company,

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: an eligible financial institution, as defined in subsection 370(1) of the Act, other than a foreign bank, or

Subparagraph.Label: (iv)
Subparagraph.Text: a foreign bank that is widely held.

Section.Text: For the purposes of sections 476 to 478 of the Act, a prescribed subsidiary of a bank is a subsidiary of the bank other than

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: an insurance company;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: a securities dealer; or

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: a subsidiary of an insurance company or securities dealer.

Subsection.Text: For the purposes of sections 476 and 477 of the Act, the prescribed percentage is 70%.
For the purpose of section 478 of the Act, the prescribed percentage is 100%.

Section.Text: For the purposes of sections 477 and 478 of the Act, the value of the participating shares and ownership interests referred to in those sections that are beneficially owned by a bank and its subsidiaries prescribed by section 4 is equal to their book value as reported on the consolidated balance sheet of the bank.

Heading.TitleText: Interests of a Bank in Real Property

Section.MarginalNote: Definition and value of interest in real property

Subsection.Text: For the purposes of Part IX of the Act, other than subsection 475(3) of the Act, sections 8 to 12 define the interests of a bank in real property and set out how those interests are to be valued.

For the purpose of subsection 475(3) of the Act, the interests of a bank in real property means real property referred to in paragraph 11(1)(a) and shares and ownership interests referred to in paragraph 11(1)(b) that become beneficially owned by the bank, or by a designated entity controlled by the bank, as a result of the realization of a security interest on a loan or debt obligation referred to in subsection 11(1).

Heading.TitleText: Direct Interests — Real Property and Debt Obligations

Subsection.Text: The following are interests of a bank in real property:

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: real property beneficially owned by the bank or by a designated entity controlled by the bank; and

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: a debt obligation, for which the bank or a designated entity controlled by the bank is liable, that was issued for the purpose of acquiring or improving real property referred to in paragraph (a).

Subsection.Text: The value of the interests of a bank in real property is

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of real property referred to in paragraph (1)(a), the book value of the real property; and

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of a debt obligation referred to in paragraph (1)(b), any amount by which the book value of the debt obligation exceeds the book value of the real property referred to in that paragraph.

Heading.TitleText: Indirect Interests — Real Property, Shares and Ownership Interests

Subsection.Text: The following are interests of a bank in real property:

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: at a particular time, real property

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: that is beneficially owned by

Clause.Label: (A)
Clause.Text: a related real property entity of the bank that is a joint venture, or

Clause.Label: (B)
Clause.Text: an entity in which an entity described in clause (A) has a substantial investment, and

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: that would be reported on a balance sheet of the bank prepared as at that time in accordance with the accounting principles and specifications of the Superintendent referred to in subsection 308(4) of the Act; and

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: shares and ownership interests beneficially owned by the bank, or by a designated entity controlled by the bank, in any related real property entity of the bank other than a related real property entity referred to in paragraph (a).

Subsection.Text: The value of the interests of a bank in real property is

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of real property referred to in paragraph (1)(a), the book value of the real property; and

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of shares and ownership interests referred to in paragraph (1)(b), the book value of the shares and ownership interests.

Heading.TitleText: Indirect Interests — Loans and Debt Obligations

Subsection.Text: The following are interests of a bank in real property:

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: a debt obligation issued by a related real property entity of the bank and beneficially owned by the bank or by a designated entity controlled by the bank;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: a loan made by the bank, or by a designated entity controlled by the bank, to a related real property entity of the bank;

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: a loan made by the bank, or by a designated entity controlled by the bank, to

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: a real property entity in which a securities dealer or insurance company controlled by the bank has a substantial investment, or

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: a real property entity that is controlled by a real property entity described in subparagraph (i);

Paragraph.Label: (d)
Paragraph.Text: a debt obligation issued by a real property entity described in subparagraph (c)(i) or (ii) and beneficially owned by the bank or by a designated entity controlled by the bank;

Paragraph.Label: (e)
Paragraph.Text: a debt obligation that is

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: issued by a related real property entity of the bank,

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: beneficially owned by a third party, and

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: guaranteed by the bank or by a designated entity controlled by the bank; and

Paragraph.Label: (f)
Paragraph.Text: a loan made by a third party to a related real property entity of the bank and guaranteed by the bank or by a designated entity controlled by the bank.

Subsection.Text: The value of the interests of a bank in real property is

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of a debt obligation referred to in paragraph (1)(a) or (d), the book value of the debt obligation;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of a loan referred to in paragraph (1)(b) or (c), the book value of the loan; and

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of a guaranteed debt obligation referred to in paragraph (1)(e) or a guaranteed loan referred to in paragraph (1)(f),

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: if the debt obligation is issued by, or the loan is made to, an entity that is a related real property entity of the bank and the entity beneficially owns real property that is an interest of the bank in real property under paragraph 9(1)(a), any amount by which the face value of the guarantee exceeds the value of the real property determined in accordance with paragraph 9(2)(a), and

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: in any other case, the face value of the guarantee.

Heading.TitleText: Indirect Interests — Secured Loans and Debt Obligations

Subsection.Text: If a bank or a designated entity controlled by a bank makes a loan to, or beneficially owns or guarantees the debt obligation of, a third party, the loan or debt obligation is an interest of the bank in real property if it is secured by

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: real property beneficially owned by a third party in conjunction with

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: the bank,

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: the designated entity,

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: a related real property entity of the bank,

Subparagraph.Label: (iv)
Subparagraph.Text: a securities dealer or insurance company controlled by the bank,

Subparagraph.Label: (v)
Subparagraph.Text: an entity controlled by a securities dealer or insurance company referred to in subparagraph (iv), or

Subparagraph.Label: (vi)
Subparagraph.Text: a real property entity described in subparagraph 10(1)(c)(i) or (ii); or

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: shares or ownership interests beneficially owned by a third party in

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: an entity that beneficially owns real property in conjunction with the bank, a related real property entity of the bank or a designated entity controlled by the bank, or

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: a related real property entity of the bank.

Subsection.Text: The value of the interests of a bank in real property is

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of a loan or debt obligation that is secured by real property referred to in paragraph (1)(a), the lesser of

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: the net realizable value of the third party’s interest in the real property at the time that the security interest was given, and

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: the amount determined by the formula

FormulaParagraph.Label: (A)
FormulaParagraph.Text: if the loan was made by the bank or a designated entity controlled by the bank or the debt obligation is beneficially owned by the bank or a designated entity controlled by the bank, the book value of the loan or debt obligation, or

FormulaParagraph.Label: (B)
FormulaParagraph.Text: if the debt obligation is guaranteed by the bank or a designated entity controlled by the bank, the face value of the guarantee, and

FormulaDefinition.Text: is the total net realizable value of any other security interests that were given for the loan or debt obligation;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of a loan or debt obligation that is secured by shares or ownership interests beneficially owned by a third party in an entity referred to in subparagraph (1)(b)(i), the lesser of

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: the net realizable value of the third party’s interest in those shares or ownership interests at the time that the security interest was given, and

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: the amount determined by the formula

FormulaParagraph.Label: (A)
FormulaParagraph.Text: if the loan was made by the bank or a designated entity controlled by the bank or the debt obligation is beneficially owned by the bank or a designated entity controlled by the bank, the book value of the loan or debt obligation, or

FormulaParagraph.Label: (B)
FormulaParagraph.Text: if the debt obligation is guaranteed by the bank or a designated entity controlled by the bank, the face value of the guarantee,

FormulaDefinition.Text: is the total net realizable value of all security interests that were given for the loan or debt obligation,
is the net realizable value of the entity’s interest in the real property referred to in subparagraph (1)(b)(i),
is the value of the shares or ownership interests that are given as the security interest, and
is the total value of the outstanding shares or ownership interests in the entity; and

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of a loan or debt obligation that is secured by shares or ownership interests beneficially owned by a third party in a related real property entity referred to in subparagraph (1)(b)(ii), the lesser of

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: the net realizable value of the third party’s interest in those shares or ownership interests at the time that the security interest was given, and

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: the amount determined by the formula

FormulaParagraph.Label: (A)
FormulaParagraph.Text: if the loan was made by the bank or a designated entity controlled by the bank or the debt obligation is beneficially owned by the bank or a designated entity controlled by the bank, the book value of the loan or debt obligation, or

FormulaParagraph.Label: (B)
FormulaParagraph.Text: if the debt obligation is guaranteed by the bank or a designated entity controlled by the bank, the face value of the guarantee, and

FormulaDefinition.Text: is the total net realizable value of any other security interests that were given for the loan or debt obligation.

Subsection.Text: The following are interests of a bank in real property:

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: a guarantee given by the bank, or by a designated entity controlled by the bank, to an entity other than the bank or designated entity for the purpose of completing the development of real property that is beneficially owned by

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: the bank,

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: a designated entity controlled by the bank, or

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: a related real property entity of the bank; and

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: an agreement made by the bank, or by a designated entity controlled by the bank, to support a third party’s cost of operating or financing real property that is beneficially owned by

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: the bank,

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: a designated entity controlled by the bank, or

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: a related real property entity of the bank.

Subsection.Text: The value of the interests of a bank in real property is

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of a guarantee referred to in paragraph (1)(a), the estimated cost of completing the development of the real property; and

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of an agreement referred to in paragraph (1)(b), the amount of any funds advanced by the bank, or by a designated entity controlled by the bank, under the agreement.

Section.Text: These Regulations come into force on the day on which sections 467 and 479 of the Bank Act, as enacted by section 127 of the Financial Consumer Agency of Canada Act, chapter 9 of the Statutes of Canada, 2001, come into force.

Footnote.Text: [Note: Regulations in force October 24, 2001, see SI/2001-102.]
